short.en: Completely private AI chat. Powered by Qwen3-4B, works offline. No data transmission, fast responses. Supports programming, learning, and creative work.

full.en:
ğŸ§  MindBridge - Next-Generation Private AI Assistant

A completely on-device AI chat application. Your conversations never leave your device.

## Key Features

ğŸ”’ Completely Private
â€¢ All processing happens on your device
â€¢ Zero data transmission to external servers
â€¢ Works completely offline

ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Native Japanese Support
â€¢ Natural and fluent Japanese conversations
â€¢ Understanding of Japanese culture and business practices
â€¢ Multilingual support (Japanese, English, Chinese)

âš¡ High-Performance AI
â€¢ Latest Qwen3-4B-Instruct model
â€¢ Metal GPU optimization for fast responses
â€¢ Real-time text generation

ğŸ¯ Versatile Applications
â€¢ Programming learning and assistance
â€¢ Creative writing support
â€¢ Educational support
â€¢ Business consultation
â€¢ Daily conversation partner

## Technical Specifications
â€¢ iOS 16.0+ supported
â€¢ A14 Bionic chip or later recommended
â€¢ ~4GB storage (including model)
â€¢ No internet connection required

Experience truly private AI conversations designed with privacy as the top priority.

review_information.notes: Initial release of on-device AI chat application. Model download (3.5GB) required on first launch. Offline operation after setup. No data collection or transmission.
review_information.demo_account: Not required - app works without account
test_instructions: 1. Launch app and complete initial model download
5. Verify offline operation in airplane mode
